name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracking Languages: YouTube Time Tracker For Language Learners

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TL is a browser extension for language learners to track their comprehensible input across a variety of languages on YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌍 Supported Languages: Track your learning progress in English, French, German, Italian, Chinese, 
 Arabic or Portuguese.

🎯 Daily Goals: Set and monitor daily comprehension goals for consistent exposure to your target language(s).

⏳ Watch Time Tracking: Track total watch time, today’s progress, and specific days with a clear and detailed history.

📊 Detailed Analytics: Gain insights into your learning habits with helpful graphs that display watch time over time and progress toward your goals.

🎥 YouTube Integration: Seamlessly add videos from your YouTube history to your total tracked time.

✨ User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean, intuitive design focused on easy navigation and effective tracking.

Tracking Languages makes it simple and engaging to set goals, monitor progress, and build sustainable language-learning habits across a wide range of supported languages.
